function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate compliance with preventive guidelines during physical activity","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stress and anxiety leading to non-compliance with preventive measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Home-based exercise as a coping strategy during lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in types of physical activities due to various factors such as lack of time, space, and increase in family roles","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased awareness of the importance of exercise and immunity during the pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic and financial distress as a barrier to physical exercise","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhibited social interaction due to social distancing may exacerbate psychological distress","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restricted collective activities during the pandemic have triggered mental health problems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced physical activity during covid-19 may lead to higher levels of loneliness, sadness, and anxiety","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Passive exercise behavior in young people","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on mental health and exercise behaviors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on remote or face-to-face supervision for exercise","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social support may lead to decreased physical activity, impacting overall health and well-being","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of robust research and data collection may limit the understanding of the role of physical activity in maintaining mental health during pandemics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited awareness of the importance of physical activity during a pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of specific demographic groups to negative effects of restriction measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different types of exercise may have varying stress-buffering effects on mental health, affecting different groups of people under different contexts","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strategies for encouraging physical activity during health crises like covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited evidence on the effectiveness of recommended physical activity strategies for the general public","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete data analysis and research on the impact of covid-19 on physical activities and mental health","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to fresh produce may lead to a higher consumption of processed, high-sodium, and less-nutritious foods with negative health impacts","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge sharing and communication on evolving health situations can lead to inadequate response to disease outbreaks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of educational programs due to closure of formal education systems","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupants’ proximity in small spaces","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collected from a specific group may not be representative of the overall population of kuwait, leading to biased conclusions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupants’ activities and schedules may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases within the houses","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density and movement in the residence","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different occupancy patterns in households increase the risk of disease spread due to movement of people between locations","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupancy in living rooms from 2:00 to 10:00 p.m. increases the risk of disease transmission due to close contact","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Peak occupancy in the kitchen for lunch and dinner preparation increases the risk of disease transmission during meal preparation times","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupancy in the bathrooms during morning routines increases the risk of disease transmission due to shared use of facilities","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural differences impacting energy consumption patterns","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of local population’s lifestyle and energy consumption habits","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Little changes in occupants’ attitude towards energy conservation","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of community participation in disease control efforts reduces the effectiveness of preventative measures and policies","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainties surrounding the spread of the virus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid sharing of information leading to quick action","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on thermal cameras for outbreak detection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmentation of information due to proprietary solutions in smart city products","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased data collection from iot devices may lead to privacy concerns and data sharing issues","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global data sharing and management may conflict with various countries’ laws and regulations, leading to legal challenges and regulatory non-compliance","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited accessibility of healthcare data to a select group of users may raise concerns of data equity and inclusivity","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to big data results in higher economic returns and increased influence for data controllers","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global competition for control of big data leads to geopolitical tensions and disputes","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global movement of people leading to enhanced transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data sharing challenges in public health surveillance","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air transportation facilitating rapid spread of coronavirus","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical delays in identifying and addressing previous outbreaks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of vital information about the ease of spread of the virus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases such as zika virus, ebola virus, and coronavirus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
